#summary Number of aliens for vindicator pellets to pierce.
#labels D-Cvar

= Description =

Number of aliens for vindicator pellets to pierce. Set to 0 to disable.

This cvar will only have an effect if the damage for the vindicator pellets is high enough to kill an alien and still have some damage left.
